roomDescription: The Deluxe King Suite (Room 101) is the epitome of luxury and comfort. With a spacious room and stunning views, it offers a tranquil haven for travelers seeking an exceptional experience. The room's tasteful decor and furnishings create an inviting atmosphere, making it ideal for couples or solo travelers. The large windows provide breathtaking vistas, adding to the room's allure. Guests have consistently praised its comfort and remarkable view, making it a memorable choice for those looking to indulge in a touch of opulence during their stay.

The Standard Double Room (Room 102) is tailored for budget-conscious travelers seeking a comfortable and convenient option for their short-term stay. While it may not boast the extravagance of larger suites, it has all the necessary amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. The room's simplicity is complemented by its practicality, making it an excellent choice for those on a tight budget or with a busy schedule during their visit.

The Luxury Ocean View Suite (Room 103) is a haven of grandeur. With a room designed to offer spacious and opulent living, this suite is nothing short of extraordinary. The room itself is adorned with lavish decor and furnishings, exuding elegance and sophistication. Regrettably, it is currently unavailable.

The Cozy Single Room (Room 104) is a modest yet charming accommodation designed especially for solo travelers. It provides a snug retreat with all the essential amenities for a comfortable stay. The room's inviting decor and warm ambiance create a tranquil setting that guarantees a restful night's sleep. Whether you are on a brief business trip or exploring the city on your own, the Cozy Single Room ensures a pleasant and peaceful stay, allowing you to recharge for your next adventure.

The Executive Suite (Room 105) is a spacious and comfortable choice for travelers who appreciate a little extra room to relax. With a sizeable area, this suite offers ample space for you to unwind. While it doesn't boast any specific views or luxurious features, it provides a serene and uncluttered environment where you can enjoy a hassle-free stay.

The Standard Queen Room (Room 106) is a sensible choice for those seeking a comfortable and reasonably priced accommodation. While it might not offer the grandeur of more expansive suites, it is well-suited for a budget-friendly city stay. The room's simplicity ensures an easy-going and affordable experience for your visit.

The Family Suite (Room 107) is tailored to meet the needs of traveling families. With a spacious room, this suite offers an abundance of room for families to stretch out and relax.
